_header: I can not know a A fro a B
_description: Complaint of the illiterate against his teacher — one couplet

HarLaw6.Transcription:
I can noght knowe a a fro a btherefore god lette the neuyr
                    thre
HarLaw6.Editions:
Voigts,  Linda Ehrsam. 
             “A Handlist of Middle English in Harvard Manuscripts.” 
             Harvard Library Bulletin
         33 (1985): 1-96: 75.
